mapper.sql:
from qna a left join member b on b.ifmmSeq = a.member_ifmmSeq where 1=1
AND a.ifqnaTitle LIKE CONCAT('%', #{shTitle}, '%')
mapper.select:
select aa.* from ( select a.ifqnaSeq, a.ifqnaTitle, a.ifqnaCate, a.ifqnaDesc, a.ifqnaDateTime, a.ifqnaDateTimeEdit, a.member_ifmmSeq, b.ifmmSeq, b.ifmmId, b.ifmmNickName
Order By a.ifqnaSeq desc ) aa limit #{rowNumToShow} offset #{startRnumForMysql}
mapper.insert:
insert into qna( ifqnaTitle, ifqnaCate, ifqnaDesc, ifqnaDateTime, ifqnaDateTimeEdit, member_ifmmSeq )values( #{ifqnaTitle}, #{ifqnaCate}, #{ifqnaDesc}, now(), now(), #{member_ifmmSeq} )
SELECT last_Insert_id()
